Text:
Won't let me edit! Here are tracks-

Very Rare on CD - contains:

1.  Santa Claus Is Coming To Town! 

2.  A Holly Jolly Christmas! 

3.  Love Is The Meaning Of Christmas 

4.  Jingle Bells 

5.  A Christmas Medley: 
      Here We Come A-Caroling! 
      The First Noel 
      Oh Come, All Ye Faithful 
      Silent Night 
      Hark! The Herald Angels Sing 
      It Came Upon A Midnight Clear 
      Anels We Have Heard On High 
      Joy To The World 

6.  Rudolph, The Red-Nosed Reindeer 

7.  The Santa Claus Parade 

8.  Jolly Old Saint Nicholas 

9.  Little Greenie 

10. A Christmas Medley (2): 
      What Child Is This? 
      God Rest Ye Merry, Gentlemen! 
      Oh, Little Town Of Bethlehem 
      Away In A Manger 
      Deck The Hall 
      O Christmas Tree (O Tannenbaum) 
      We Wish You A Merry Christmas!
